statements: DELETE FROM shipment_tracking WHERE delivery_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status = 'pending' AND delivery_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM shipment_tracking WHERE delivery_time IS NULL;
DELETE FROM shipment_status WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND status = 'Delivered';
DELETE FROM shipment_status JOIN delivery_times ON shipment_status.shipment_id = delivery_times.shipment_id WHERE shipment_status.status = 'In Transit';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2001 AND customer_email = 'example@example.com';
DELETE FROM delivery_times WHERE shipment_id IN (SELECT shipment_id FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'Delivered');
DELETE FROM products WHERE weight > 100 AND price < 50.00;
